# Frame Animation Vista Graphics supports frame-based animation for sprites and sequences. ## Frame Counter `draw canvas [ frame: frame + 1 sprite "animation.png" (frame % 4 * 32) 0 32 32 100 100 ]` ## Animation Speed `draw canvas [ frame: frame + 1 sprite "walk.png" ((frame / 5) % 4 * 32) 0 32 32 100 100 ]` ## Frame Control - **frame**: Current frame counter - **fps**: Frames per second - **frame-time**: Time since last frame ## See Also - [Animation Basics](/wiki/graphics/animation/animation-basics/) - Fundamentals - [Sprite Sheets](/wiki/graphics/images/sprite-sheets/) - Sprite animation
